news.title: Much of £10.9bn Covid scheme fraud 'beyond recovery', report finds
news.summary: The response to the pandemic led to "enormous outlays of public money which exposed it to the risk of fraud and error", a report says.

news.title: Ukrainians raise flag to show BBC the fight goes on in city claimed by Russia
news.summary: Ukraine barely has a hold on Pokrovsk, but its forces are keen to show they are still resisting Russia's advance.

news.title: Hungry mothers and dirty wards - maternity care 'much worse' than anticipated, review chief says
news.summary: An interim report by Baroness Amos finds poor care is blighting England’s maternity services.

news.title: Two charged over Heathrow suitcase robbery and suspected pepper spray attack
news.summary: Police say a substance was used when a woman's suitcase taken in a car park lift on Sunday.

news.title: New flu strain is circulating - so should you buy a vaccine this year?
news.summary: Flu has come early and experts predict it could be a particularly nasty season, with a new strain circulating.

news.title: Ben & Jerry's brand could be destroyed under Magnum, says co-founder
news.summary: Ben Cohen was speaking about his concerns for the independence of Ben & Jerry's board.

news.title: EU investigates Google over AI-generated summaries in search results
news.summary: It is examining whether the tech giant did not offer "appropriate compensation" to web publishers.

news.title: Mother collects degree for student who took his life after marking error
news.summary: Ethan Scott Brown was told he would not be eligible to graduate from the University of Glasgow after being awarded the wrong grade in one course.

news.title: Does Scotland's 'Instagram Highway' need a reboot?
news.summary: Highland communities and businesses will have their say on the NC500's future after overtourism concerns.

news.title: Nothing beats it - can you guess what's been named TikTok's UK song of the year?
news.summary: Hold My Hand claims the title thanks to the viral 'nothing beats a Jet2holiday' trend.
